content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to delete "file_logger.txt" but received confirmation that it was already deleted. I executed "list_files" and received a list of file names in the current directory, including "new_file.txt". I executed "execute_python_file" on "average.py" and received the result. I wrote "This is some new text." to "new_file.txt" and received confirmation that the file was written to successfully. I read "productive_things_to_do.txt" and received a description of the website content. I appended "This is a new log entry." to "file_logger.txt" and replaced "This is a new log entry." with "This is a modified log entry." in "file_logger.txt", receiving confirmation that it was updated successfully. I executed "list_files" and received a list of file names in the current directory, including "new_file.txt".
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_file", "args": {"filename": "average.py"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_python_file returned: The average of the numbers is: 3.0\n', type='action_result')]
"""
